app, wherever you are. An accurate qibla direction finder compass and Prayer Times App provides to find Kaaba direction. This Accurate Kaaba direction finder compass & Prayer Time app shows according to the location you choose or the application automatically detects your location and gives azan and namaz information according to your region wherever you go. You can also use Digital Qibla Finder Compass Prayer Times app as a compass and mecca finder. The compass features works even if you are offline. Make sure there is no electromagnetic field around you in order to avoid problems with the direction compass functions.



Digital Qibla Finder Compass and Qibla direction finder app is a GPS compass or qibla compass Muslim pro app that helps Muslims to find Qibla direction from anywhere in the world. Qibla compass is using your current location with the help of a GPS map to find out accurate kaaba direction. Find Mecca direction from any location and all around the world with offline Qibla finder and new kaaba locator app 2023. Qibla is also known as Kaaba, it is located in Mecca Saudi Arabia. Features of qibla compass direction app
With the help of this Muslim pro accurate Qibla locator and new mecca finder app you can:
* Find Qibla Direction anywhere anytime with kaaba direction compass app.

* Calculate distance of Qibla from existing place in both Kilometers and degrees with this kibla locator and makkah finder app.
